Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us and is tailored to meet your needs. After careful consideration, we propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. We believe this offers a fair balance between the value we place on it and the benefits it will bring to you. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
